text: Alstom is a French company specialized in rail transport. It is based in Saint-Ouen-sur-Seine, France. It is one of the largest rail transport manufacturer in the world. In 2021, the Group bought the Bombardier Transportation company.Alstom rachète Bombardier Transport pour 5,5 milliards d’euros The company was founded in 1928.1928 - 2014 : l'histoire d'Alstom, de General Electric à General Electric ? == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:1920s establishments in France Category:1928 establishments in Europe Category:Rail transport in France Category:Manufacturing companies of France
title: Alstom
